childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
Product and technology leader with experience building innovative and powerful SaaS products while growing and developing highly effective product management teams. Retail and e-commerce specialties in the live engagement space (chatbot, video, sharing). Proven track record leading new product strategy from inception to leading cross-functional teams in preparation of go-to-market. Passionate about building compelling customer experiences that are fun to use and powered by data.

Specialties: Data-Driven Product Strategy & Roadmap, Product Team Building & Leadership, Highly Technical ("Hands On" Coding and Development), Product Evangelism, UX Design, Build-Buy-Partner Analysis, SaaS, Platform Development
